name: PSXFunkin
overview: A PlayStation 1 port of Friday Night Funkin'. Note however that, since everything has to be ported by hand, that this port is still a little work in progress, I am working on it though and have gotten a good amount of the game finished and ported over, and it is fully playable regardless. All weeks are implemented, although some currently lack full visuals (Weeks 5 and 6). Two mods are included, VS. Kapi and VS. Tricky, used with permission Week 7 is included, used with permission
